about_the_game:
Gears & Spells! Rogue-lite lovers, come join the fight!. 

The sultan, who empowered steam engines with magic, was being sabotaged by bigots. The future of the Sultanate is at stake! But as "Dilber Hatun", it is up to us to clean up the city and save the sultanate.

Pick your top weapon, use your abilities and watch your step to take on rogue robots and ruthless bigots. Get stronger with countless abilities, battle tactics and character enhancements and beat the hell out of tough bosses!



FULLFILL YOUR OWN DESTINY!
Build your character, each weapon, special ability and every upgrade will be your choice. Whether you fight for gold or for the sword. You can become a tank, an agile fighter or a master of special abilities. Your game your decision!

Invite your allies trapped in the city to the airship. Take quests from them and improve your character. Use the mastery table to make permanent upgrades. Strategize your tactics against different enemies.



Fight to the end. Don't be afraid to die, every single death will be an experience. When you are unbeatable, you will prove that you are the true savior of this city!

Take the first step in your fight by adding Rogue Ottoman to your wishlist!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ventura
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Venture+
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1

name: Rogue Ottoman

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 / AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A working sound device
  • Additional Notes: 64 Bit Windows
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 / AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A working sound device
  • Additional Notes: 64 Bit Windows

short_description: Equip your sword and special abilities. Jump into the fast-paced action of the rogue-lite mechanics in an orientalist-steampunk universe. Gain experience and get new skills, build your character and save the city by defeating the bosses! Fight to the end or die! No checkpoints!
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
